actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a credit against income tax if a taxpayer, his spouse, or any dependent of the taxpayer is handicapped.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a $750 refundable income tax credit for each taxpayer, spouse or other dependent who is mentally or physically handicapped.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a credit against income tax if a taxpayer, his spouse, or any dependent of the taxpayer is handicapped.
